abstract: Dance-rock band LCD Soundsystem plays reunion show at Webster Hall just five years after retiring in 2011; announces upcoming album and future concerts, including appearance at Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival.
lead_paragraph: The band played on Sunday at Webster Hall, the first of two shows before a headlining set in April at the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival.

headline.main: LCD Soundsystem, Split Up in 2011, Joins the Reunion Circuit
headline.print_headline: Retirement  Wraps Up;  a Reunion Kicks Off

snippet: The band played on Sunday at Webster Hall, the first of two shows before a headlining set in April at the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival.

keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
